name: Jones Lang LaSalle Incorporated
description: Jones Lang LaSalle Incorporated (JLL) is a leading professional services firm specializing in real estate and investment management. Founded in 1783, JLL has grown into one of the largest and most respected companies in the global real estate sector, providing a comprehensive range of services to clients across various industries. The company operates in more than 80 countries, employing over 91,000 professionals dedicated to delivering exceptional solutions in real estate, investment management, and property management. JLL's services include leasing, property management, project management, capital markets, and advisory services, all focused on maximizing the value of real estate assets. The firm is known for its innovative approach to real estate, leveraging technology and data analytics to enhance operational efficiency and drive sustainable growth. JLL is committed to sustainability and responsible business practices, actively working to promote environmentally friendly initiatives in real estate development and management. Their mission is to create rewarding opportunities and outstanding value for clients and shareholders while fostering a culture of diversity and inclusion within the organization.

seo.meta_title: Jones Lang LaSalle (JLL) | Global Real Estate Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Jones Lang LaSalle (JLL), a global leader in real estate and investment management, offering innovative solutions and services for clients worldwide.

faq.question: What services does JLL offer?
faq.answer: JLL offers a range of services including leasing, property management, project management, capital markets, and advisory services.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of JLL?
faq.answer: Christian Ulbrich is the CEO of Jones Lang LaSalle Incorporated.

faq.question: Where is JLL headquartered?
faq.answer: JLL is headquartered in Chicago, Illinois, USA.
